short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tradingview Terminal Trade crypto on ByBit directly from TradingView- the fast, easy, and secure for crypto traders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Leader.Trade, a revolutionary Chrome extension designed to empower crypto traders with the ability to seamlessly open positions on top exchanges such as ByBit, OKX, BingX, and BitGet directly from TradingView. Built on the robust API of Trigger.Trade, Leader.Trade brings the convenience of trading on TradingView to a whole new level with a user-friendly draggable overlay. This innovative tool is the key to trading quickly and securely without the hassle of switching between tabs or platforms.

Leader.Trade not only simplifies the trading process by eliminating the need to leave TradingView but also enhances your trading experience by integrating directly with your preferred crypto exchanges. Our extension bridges the gap between TradingView's analytical tools and the execution capabilities of major exchanges, providing you with a streamlined workflow that saves time and focuses on strategy.

Features of Leader.Trade include:

Direct trading on TradingView: Open and close positions on your chosen exchanges without leaving TradingView.
Secure and quick trades: Our extension ensures a secure trading environment with fast execution, so you never miss an opportunity.
Easy-to-use interface: The draggable overlay is designed for efficiency, allowing for effortless navigation and operation.
Enhanced trading strategies: Leverage the combined power of TradingView's analysis and Leader.Trade's execution capabilities to refine your trading strategies.
Disclaimer: Leader.Trade utilizes affiliate programs to support its development and offer advanced features. We have partnerships with ByBit, OKX, BingX, and BitGet, among others. These affiliations help us continue to improve our service for you. We cannot be held responsible for any trading losses. For more information, please visit our Chrome Web Store page.

Embrace the future of crypto trading with Leader.Trade and take your TradingView experience to unprecedented heights. Try Leader.Trade today and revolutionize your trading efficiency and effectiveness. Join us in elevating your trading journey to the next level!
